typeDescriptions.typeString: struct WaffleMaker.Waffle storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
Cast a vote for the waffleId provided from the sender account.
   No more than MAX_VOTES_PER_ACCOUNT votes can be cast per account.*

Concludes the competition and distributes the rewards to the owner
   of the waffle with the most votes
   Can be called by anyone past the competition end timestamp*

bakeWaffleLayer(uint256).notice: Add a new layer to the waffleId provided if the waffle is owned by the sender and if last   layer has been customized*

concludeCompetition().notice: Concludes the competition and distributes the rewards to the owner   of the waffle with the most votes   Can be called by anyone past the competition end timestamp*

getCompetitionEndTimestamp().notice: Returns the timestamp at which the competition will end and concludeCompetition()   can be called by anyone to distribute the reward*

voteWaffle(uint256).notice: Cast a vote for the waffleId provided from the sender account.   No more than MAX_VOTES_PER_ACCOUNT votes can be cast per account.*
